verses.roman:
tāṅra pāche pāche āmi karinu gamana
tāṅra bhūṣā-dhvanite āmāra harila śravaṇa

synonyms: tāṅra pāche pāche—just behind Him; āmi—I; karinu gamana—went; tāṅra—His; bhūṣā-dhvanite—by the sound of ornaments; āmāra—My; harila—became captivated; śravaṇa—ears.
translation: "I entered the bower just behind Kṛṣṇa, My ears captivated by the sound of His ornaments.
